name: calcHist
description: The FireSight calcHist stage generates a histogram for the current pipeline image. This stage is primarily diagnostic and provides only a subset of the functionality of OpenCV calcHist.

parameters.name: accumulate
parameters.description: If true, bin values for separate channels will be summed. Default is false

parameters.name: channels
parameters.description: is a JSON vector of channel indexes. The default is [], which will use all image channels. For an RGB image, this will be identical to [0 1 2]. For a monochrome image, this will be identical to [0]. The maximum number of channels in the array is 4.

parameters.name: dims
parameters.description: histogram dimensions. Default is 1. At this time, only 1 dimension is supported.

parameters.name: rangeMax
parameters.description: maximum (exclusive)( value to use for range. Default is 256

parameters.name: rangeMin
parameters.description: minimum (inclusive) value to use for range. Default is 0
